title: Low priority queues with Riot connection issues
body: OK, I am evil and need to be corrected so I accept the punishment and hence the lower priority queue but shame that Riot did a horrible job with connections in their clients. They keep breaking and dropping and then the lower priority queue does not hold and restarts. You guys really need to get your shit together ... because this is a horrible experience.

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find a recorded issue with the servers. Please note that low-priority queues cannot be placed on your account until a **consistent trend of disconnections* has happened on your account.

Most connection issues are caused by local misconfigurations that really don't play well with League. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) is a *fantastic resource* for common solutions for this problem. I'd strongly recommend giving all the included steps a try.

Let me know if you continue to experience disconnections after taking those steps.
